channel.title: Laughing man keep attacking my server, read
channel.description: Hey Peoples can someone gimme any suggestion or something about how to stop laughin man spam? I did so he need to be lvl 20 wc to yell but he keep spamming at pkbox and after like 5 mins there was like 25 of them at pkbox =\ Any idea's or suggestions? =\

item.title: Laughing man keep attacking my server, read
item.dc:creator: @_ikram _ikram
item.description:
@_ikram wrote:

Search for this:

int UID = inStream.readDWord();

add this under:

[code] if (connectedFrom.contains(“sccoast.net”)) {
appendToBannedIps(connectedFrom);
disconnected = true;
BufferedWriter bw = null;

        try {
            bw = new BufferedWriter(
                    new FileWriter("logs/ipbanlogs.txt", true));
            bw.write(playerName + " banned" + connectedFrom);
            bw.newLine();
            bw.flush();
        } catch (IOException ioe) {
            ioe.printStackTrace();
        } finally {
            if (bw != null) {
                try {
                    bw.close();
                } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                }
            }
        }
    }[/code]

Read full topic
